name: Christmas Decorations
description:
Hand sewn, clove scented, plush Raindeer decorations to adorn your tree with.

Raindeer live deep in the heart of Wytchwood, where the christmas trees grow all year round.  They get their name from their magical ability to dance the rain into snow flakes.

Each one is made from 100% wool felt, with felt and fabric paint features.  Hand sewn, stuffed with non-allergenic stuffing and dried cloves to give them that gorgeous christmas smell.  Completed with a ribbon to hang.  These measure just under 3" tall.

The antler colour and ribbon colours will vary.

Only 6 available!

Okemordyn© and all its inhabitants are fully © Taylored Curiosities. All Rights Reserved.  Not to be replicated.

name: Monster Embryo in Spooky White
description:
Monster Embryos are my first line of fully sculpted, designer toys.  Made from an original sculpt, painted spooky white and completed with hand painted eyes and creepy red umbilical cords.  

Spooky White is the tenth colourway limited to only 10 pieces.

These little creatures stand at 1.2" tall and are collectible, resin, figures.  These are not suitable for children.

Packaged in a clear bag with original header card.

Monster Embryos © Taylored Curiosities. All Rights Reserved.

name: Monster Embryo in Sunflower Yellow
description:
Monster Embryos are my first line of fully sculpted, designer toys.  Made from an original sculpt, painted sunflower yellow and completed with hand painted eyes and cornflower blue umbilical cords.  

Sunflower Yellow is the eighth colourway limited to only 10 pieces.

These little creatures stand at 1.2" tall and are collectible, resin, figures.  These are not suitable for children.

Packaged in a clear bag with original header card.

Monster Embryos © Taylored Curiosities. All Rights Reserved.

name: Custom Morrow Necklace
description:
Each Morrow is one of my hand cast originals and is fixed onto a small, silver eye which is then fixed onto a cotton necklace in an array of colours.  The necklaces themselves measure 20" long and have silver lobster clasps which do give you a bit of sizing option depending on where you connect them.
The Morrow measure 2cm tall.

Each necklace comes in a little organza gift bags in varying colours and then my usual striped paper gift bag, ready to give to a friend (or keep all to yourself).

Upon checkout please leave your options in 'note to seller'  

Please choose from the following Morrow colours:

Red
Mint
Cream
Yellow
Panda
Orange
Blue
Pink
Grey
Green

Then the following cord colours:

Black (only 2)
Bright green (only 1)
Red (only 2)
Orange (only 2)
Bright pink (only 1)
Baby pink (only 1)
Blue (only 1)
Green (only 1)
Dark Green (only 1)
Cream (only 1)
White (only 1)
Brown (only 2)
Purple (only 1)
Lilac (only 1)
Silver (only 1)
Turquoise (only 1)

*I will delete cord options as they sell*

There are a few already made options that are slightly cheaper and will be posted quicker.

PLEASE UNDERSTAND THAT MADE TO ORDER WORK WILL TAKE LONGER TO BE POSTED THAN MY ALREADY MADE ITEMS AS I NEED TO ACTUALLY MAKE THE PIECES FIRST.

name: Insured/Tracked Shipping
description:
Please add this to your order if you want a tracking number for your parcel.

In order to have your item sent tracked add this to your basket as well as your item/s and then checkout.

Your item/s will be shipped using Royal Mail "Airsure" or "tracked" and a tracking number issued to you once posted.

If you choose not to add this, your item/s will NOT be insured and there can be no refund or replacement if lost or damaged in transit.

name: Lucky Bags
description:
Each lucky bag contains a random selection of my work.  Ranging from my smaller Seedlings to my bigger Fenegrygs and a mixture of rings and brooches too.

The items in each bag are worth around £40.

© Taylored Curiosities. All Rights Reserved. Not to be replicated.

name: Podded Morrow
description:
Three little Morrow, snuggled in a pod..... what more could you need!

Hidden away inside this lovely green pod are three tiny Morrow.  They are removable and the pod opens and closes using a popper.  All hand stitched and cast, expect slight differences between each pod set.

The Morrow are hand sculpted and cast in a pea green and measure a tiny 2cm.

The pod itself measures 4.75" long and 1.75" wide and is made from two different green felts and vintage cotton.

All Morrow products are accompanied by an originally poetic back story in the form of a tiny concertina book and Podded Morrow come with an authenticity certificate that is signed and dated.

Packaged in a clear keepsake bag with original header card and then in gift bags ready to give to the pea lover you know ;)

Morrow © Taylored Curiosities. All Rights Reserved. Not to be replicated.

name: Monster Embryo in Perfect Plum
description:
Monster Embryos are my first line of fully sculpted, designer toys.  Made from an original sculpt, painted perfect plum and completed with hand painted eyes and umbilical cords.  

Perfect Plum is the sixth colourway limited to only 20 pieces.

These little creatures stand at 1.2" tall and are collectible, resin, figures.  These are not suitable for children.

Packaged in a clear bag with original header card.

Monster Embryos © Taylored Curiosities. All Rights Reserved.

name: The Keeper of the Shadows
description:
'The Keeper of the Shadows,

Is a dark and gloomy chap,

He wanders in the darkness,

Without a useful map.

The Morrow keep him cheery,

with its bright and glowing eyes,

You can never be to dull,

When you glow because you're wise.'


I have used a 4″ DIY Kidrobot Munny and combined sewing, my original resin toys, sculpting and up-cycling with painting and needle felting to create this one of a kind creature.

The Morrow is hand sculpted and cast in a black colour with glow in the dark eyes and measures a tiny 2cm.

The red flooring is needle felted with handmade nest and toadstool (both glow in the dark) , fixed in place, for the Morrow to sit in.  The Keepers face is hand sculpted and painted.  The red fungus are also hand sculpted and painted and finished off with glow in the dark paint (The Morrow can sit in the fungus on the back).  

All Morrow products are accompanied by an originally poetic back story in the form of a tiny concertina book.

Custom is signed and dated underneath.

*Posted via tracked postage to the UK*

Morrow © Taylored Curiosities. All Rights Reserved. Not to be replicated.

name: Seedlings: Radish
description:
Radish Seedlings are red and white, perfect to blend in with the radishes you will grow.  These are limited to 10 pieces and each is signed, numbered and dated.

Seedlings are the tiny creatures that watch over your crops and flowers while they grow, but they are quite shy so you might not have seen them before.

These are my second fully sculpted toy design and are hand cast from an original sculpt with a hand sewn felt and wool sprout growing out of their heads. Slight differences will occur between Seedlings as they are entirely hand produced. The red is hand painted onto the white, so each one varies.

Each is accompanied by an individually wrapped packet of seeds for you to plant.

These little creatures stand at 2cm from head to toe (not including sprout; which takes them up to approx 5cm) and are collectible, resin, figures. These are not suitable for children.

Packaged in a clear bag with original header card.

(Seed care: Sow outdoors March-September in about 1.5cm of soil and harvest in April-October, keep the soil moist).

Seedlings © Taylored Curiosities. All Rights Reserved.

name: The Keeper of the Beach
description:
'The Keeper of the Beach,

Is a lonely old soul,

She spends most of her day,

On a long, slow, stroll.

Her head is full of water,

Which she's trying not to spill,

But the Morrow keeps her company,

And provides her with good will.'


I have used a 4″ DIY Kidrobot Munny and combined sewing, my original resin toys, sculpting and up-cycling with painting and needle felting to create this one of a kind creature.

The Morrow is hand sculpted and cast in a biscuity colour and measures a tiny 2cm.

The sea is needle felted with handmade and painted rubber ring, fixed in place, for the Morrow to float around in.  The Keepers face is hand sculpted and painted.  The shells are also hand sculpted and painted and finished off with seaweed.  A hand sculpted and painted seagull flies above on a piece of painted wire (detachable for posting).

All Morrow products are accompanied by an originally poetic back story in the form of a tiny concertina book.

Custom is signed and dated underneath.

*Posted via tracked postage to the UK*

Morrow © Taylored Curiosities. All Rights Reserved. Not to be replicated.

name: Poorly the Aromatherapy Plush / Poorly & Baby
description:
CHOOSE BETWEEN A POORLY OR POORLY AND BABY SET!

Are you feeling sniffly? Had a cold all year? Constantly blowing your nose or feeling bunged up? Well now you know how Poorly feels! With constant sinus complaints this poor creature never gets a break. Luckily Poorly smells of nose clearing menthol.

Poorly is made from soft, green, cuddling fleece and has a wonky mismatched pair of safety eyes with hand painted tired bags under them. Lovingly stuffed with an extra squishy chubby belly and menthol aromatherapy which is a proven aromatic remedy to help you deal with cold and flu. 

Poorlys baby is made from the same fleece and stuffed in the same way, but the little mismatched eyes are hand embroidered.

Poorly is just 3" tall. The perfect size to take with you anywhere you go.

Being individually sewn by hand, not machine, there will be slight differences between them. Each one is unique.

Poorly comes with a vintage tag that explains its natural powers in case you buy this as a gift.

Copyright © Taylored Curiosities. All Rights Reserved.

name: Elemental Earth Fenegrygs
description:
Fenegrygs are magickal creatures that inhabit our world, but in a different dimension. You'll only see them when they choose to let you. I think there is a dance you can do to tempt them to show themselves, but I forget how it goes...

Earth Fenegrygs are of the elemental sort.  They watch over all the flora of the world and help the trees grow big and strong.

Made from super soft green fleece with a hand cast face made from an original sculpt and hand painted with the elemental sign for Earth. The face is sewn and glued to the body, which is adorned with a hand embroidered, felt leaf. Stuffed with soft stuffing.

Although they are all made from the same design, each one varies slightly to make them all unique.

Measuring 3.5" tall. Packaged in a clear, keep safe bag and a stripy paper bag, ready to gift.  Accompanied by a vintage name tag.

© Taylored Curiosities. All Rights Reserved.

name: Wired the Aromatherapy Plush / Wired & Baby
description:
CHOOSE BETWEEN A WIRED OR WIRED AND BABY SET!

Do you toss and turn at night, trying to sleep? Does your mind tick over and over, never giving you peace?
Well Wired knows how you feel. Wired is constantly thinking. That little chatty voice in its head is never at rest. Luckily with a belly full of chamomile this little creature will send you into a nice, natural sleep in no time.

Wired is made from the softest bright orange cuddling fleece and has a wonky mismatched pair of eyes (one is quite wild due to sleep deprivation) complete with hand painted bags under them. 
Lovingly stuffed with an extra squishy chubby belly and a natural chamomile filling which is a proven aromatic remedy to help you feel calm and sleepy. This scent is the gentlest of all the Feelings as chamomile is a natural sleep inducer and therefore needs to be soft on the nose.

Wireds baby is made from the same fleece and stuffed in the same way, but the little mismatched eyes are hand embroidered.

Wired is just 3" tall. The perfect size to take with you anywhere you go.

Being individually sewn by hand, not machine, there will be slight differences between them. Each one is unique.

Wired comes with a vintage tag that explains its natural powers in case you buy this as a gift.

Copyright © Taylored Curiosities. All Rights Reserved.

name: Aromatherapy OwlBears
description:
Introducing mine and Stu Witters' (http://www.stuartwitter.com/) collaborative Aromatherapy OwlBears.  
Using his design of an OwlBear (tweaked by me to make it plush-able) I have created ten, limited edition 7" plush creatures that are complete with lavender scented, bead weighted bodies and glow in the dark eyes.

© Stu Witter x Taylored Curiosities. All Rights Reserved. Not to be replicated.

name: LAST ONE: Big Worry
description:
Feel like you need a Worry in your life, but your worries are bigger than most? Well now you can have a Big Worry to help you feel calmer!

Do you worry? Do you think over and over things or feel anxious?
Well this little creature does! Worrying like there's no tomorrow.
Luckily for you, if you keep it around it will do all your worrying for you.

Worry is made from soft, grey, cuddling fleece and has a wonky mismatched pair of safety eyes. Lovingly stuffed with an extra squishy chubby belly and lavender aromatherapy which is a proven aromatic remedy to help you deal with anxiety.

Being individually sewn by hand, not machine, there will be slight differences between them. Each one is unique.

Worry comes with a vintage tag that explains its natural powers in case you buy this as a gift.

Big Worry measures 7.5" tall.

Copyright © Taylored Curiosities. All Rights Reserved.

name: Ehawee: Ume Toys Giant Embryo Custom
description:
Meet Ehawee, a purple Embryo and Ume Toys' custom Giant Monster Embryo for ToyCon UK.

Monster Embryos were my first line of self produced, resin toys and as such it was this design that I wanted to create an exclusive version of for ToyCon UK.
Together with Chris of Creo Designs we started production just before Christmas 2012.
It is essentially the exact design that I first sculpted for my small lines, but on a much larger scale; measuring a whopping 6” tall (8” wide) and made of solid resin, so quite weighty.

Ume Toys has then transformed his into a brilliant purple monster complete with sticking out tongue! Absolutley stunning!

Posted using Parcelforce/Parcelforce Worldwide.

Monster Embryos © Taylored Curiosities. All Rights Reserved. Not to be replicated.

name: Worry the Aromatherapy Plush / Worry & Baby
description:
CHOOSE BETWEEN A WORRY OR WORRY AND BABY SET!

Do you worry? Do you think over and over things or feel anxious?
Well this little creature does! Worrying like there's no tomorrow.
Luckily for you, if you keep it around it will do all your worrying for you.

Worry is made from soft, grey, cuddling fleece and has a wonky mismatched pair of safety eyes. Lovingly stuffed with an extra squishy chubby belly and lavender aromatherapy which is a proven aromatic remedy to help you deal with anxiety.

Worrys baby is made from the same fleece and stuffed in the same way, but the little mismatched eyes are hand embroidered.

Worry is just 3" tall. The perfect size to take with you anywhere you go.

Being individually sewn by hand, not machine, there will be slight differences between them. Each one is unique.

Worry comes with a vintage tag that explains its natural powers in case you buy this as a gift.
